content:
I'm trying to answer the question "what are the kinds of projects Rust is used for" and "what are the kinds of projects Rust is NOT used for" -- and that's rather difficult. But it'd be interesting to see the following correlations:

  • Of people who use Rust at work, what are their answers to the "What industries do you work in" question?
  • Of people who use Rust at work, what are their answers to the "What titles best match your role" question?
  • Of people who do not use Rust (or do not use Rust at work), what are their answers to the "What industries do you work in" question?
  • Of people who do not use Rust (or do not use Rust at work), what are their answers to the "What titles best match your role" question?

cc @Jasun Carr -- would it be hard to produce that above? Also, would you have any suggestions for tooling that I could use for answering these sorts of things myself in the future? (Can I do this easily with a google spreadsheet...)
(Also cc anyone else who is interested)
I had been working on the draft based on this doc https://paper.dropbox.com/doc/Rust-Survey-2019-z6ZJYlpf1kBQp3uFNxa2q
I'm happy to re-work the github draft to correlate better with the blog post outline doc
@Nell Shamrell-Harrington if you hvae a few minutes, want to jump in a zoom call briefly to discuss the outline?
